title: Players in wrong Ranked League
body:
Hey Riot Just quick Thing, I play ranked quite abit mostly casual.. Anyways (i know this will sound like **_"BUT IM NOT SUPPOSE TO BE SILVER IM CHALLENGER PLAYER MATERIAL"_**) But most games i play theres generally 3 decent players and the other 7 are just plain bad.. Ranked is abit better but still i cant help but wonder why do people in Bronze V - Level 23 Rank in Sliver / Gold games???

It just baffles me, Like i understand they may be duoing and im more than happy to assist new comers dont get me wrong but when i want to play a proper game / warm up round before ranked.. i just get like Duo Yi and Blitz top when normal Structure is **1 top, 1 mid , 1 JG and 2 bot lane**

I just feel a little disapointed that its continuing as much as its not a **MAJOR** issue i cant help feeling that others feel the same

Thanks and have a great day :D

replies.body:
Are you talking about normal matchmaking?
> why do people in Bronze V - Level 23 Rank in Sliver / Gold games???

Because our server population is small, and normal mmr and ranked mmr are completely separate. you can have normal games where bronze is matched with challenger. It all depends on who queues at what time and with whom.

> [{quoted}](name=Yaiamone,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=8Q3QiVEv,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-09-29T02:12:21.152+0000)
>
> Are you talking about normal matchmaking?
> 
> Because our server population is small, and normal mmr and ranked mmr are completely separate. you can have normal games where bronze is matched with challenger. It all depends on who queues at what time and with whom.

Yaia step away from the bait ;^)

That sort of a tad unfair? i dunno i just dont like playing casual with low players, 

Sometimes in ranked too you get the rare bronze V in ranked (not saying im _Bronze material and play like diamond i swear cuz_) just find it annoying
You've played 36 games of ranked this season, how is that enough to come to a conclusion of the system
Ranked and In general.. if you see my s5 ive played well over 100 games
